timeline.message: (In progress) Start working on sync test

timeline.bodyText: These log statements are a good idea - we should put them in the DSL (ie ArtemisNode.start() should automatically print a debug log).  The messages would be slightly less nice (each node has a unique name but it's not as nice a "first node") but it would make the tests simpler and give better progress indicators for all tests.
timeline.author: ajsutton
